original_problem_description: A recycling plant processes various materials. Each material has a different processing cost and resale value. The aim is to optimize the processing of materials to minimize waste and maximize profit.

questions.vague_problem_description: A recycling plant processes various materials to maximize profit.
questions.clarifying_question: Is the plant also aiming to minimize waste or are there any environmentally associated constraints?

questions.vague_problem_description: A recycling plant processes various materials. Each material impacts the plant's operations differently.
questions.clarifying_question: Can you specify how processing costs and resale value for each material factor into the plant's objective of profit maximization?

questions.vague_problem_description: A recycling plant processes various materials to minimize waste and improve financial outcomes.
questions.clarifying_question: Does 'improve financial outcomes' specifically relate to maximizing profit, or does it also include other financial metrics such as cost reduction or revenue maximization?
